candidates.name: Donald J. Trump

bio.intro: Donald J. Trump is a businessman and politician who served as the 45th President of the United States from 2017 to 2021. Before entering politics, he was a real estate developer and television personality.

What is your stance on abortion?: Pro-Life
Pro-life, and I also oppose abortion for victims of rape and incest
Should funding for local police departme: Back The Blue
No, increase funding and training for police departments in higher crime rate communities
Should the federal government increase f: No, the federal government should not increase funding for any social programs
Should the U.S. raise taxes on the rich?: No, keep the current tax structure
Should the government increase environme: Climate Change Denial
No, global warming is a natural occurrence and there's nothing we can do
Should there be more restrictions on the: Gun Rights
No, the government should not infringe on the second amendment.
Do you support affirmative action progra: No, and minority groups should not receive any favorable treatment
Should the U.S. build a wall along the s: Yes, and Mexico should pay for it
Do you support the Affordable Care Act (: No, government should not be involved in healthcare

candidates.position_summary: During his time as president, Donald Trump's major policy achievements included tax reform, appointment of conservative judges, and efforts to reduce regulations.

candidates.name: Joseph R. Biden Jr.

offices_held: Vice President of the United States: 2009-2017
bio.intro: Joseph R. Biden Jr. is a politician who became the 46th President of the United States in January 2021. He previously served as the Vice President of the United States under President Barack Obama from 2009 to 2017 and as a U.S. Senator from Delaware from 1973 to 2009.

What is your stance on abortion?: Pro-Choice
Pro-choice, and providing birth control, sex education, and more social services will help reduce the number of abortions
Should convicted criminals have the righ: Yes, except for felons convicted of murder or violent crimes
Should funding for local police departme: Community Policing
Yes, replace police with unarmed community-based responders for non-violent calls
Should the government increase or decrea: Neither, I am satisfied with the current amount of spending
If found guilty, should former President: No, no one is above the law
Should the government increase environme: Increase regulations Incentivize Energy
Yes, and provide more incentives for alternative energy production
Should the government raise the federal: Yes, make it a living wage
Should there be more restrictions on the: Gun Control
Yes, require more stringent background checks, training, and add more psychological testing.
Should the U.S. build a wall along the s: No, this would be too costly and ineffective

candidates.position_summary: As President, Joseph Biden has focused on issues such as COVID-19 response, climate change, infrastructure, and economic recovery.

candidates.name: Howie Hawkins

Pro-choice, and providing birth control, sex education, and more social services will help reduce the number of abortions

If found guilty, should former President: No, no one is above the law
Should the government increase environme: Increase regulations Incentivize Energy
Yes, and provide more incentives for alternative energy production

Do you support affirmative action progra: Yes, but it's only a band-aid trying to heal a much larger issue and we should create more social programs to address racial inequity
Should the U.S. build a wall along the s: No, this would be too costly and ineffective
Do you support the Affordable Care Act (: Yes, but a mandatory single-payer system would be even better
